sentences.sContent: The government shoulders ethic obligation, she has to induct and maintain the rationalization of the living world.
sentences.sContent_eng: The government shoulders ethic obligation, she has to induct and maintain the rationalization of the living world.
sentences.sCn: 政府在生活世界中引导和维护生活世界的合理化，肩负著伦理责任；

synos.tran: 引导；感应；使…就职；征召入伍

remMethod.val: in(内) + duct(拉) → 向里面拉 → 使正式就任

words.tran: [数] 归纳的；[电] 感应的；诱导的
[电磁] 感应；归纳法；感应现象
感应器；授职者；圣职授予的人
应召入伍的士兵；就任者
